Organizations

A

Abraxas Clan

A therian pack with a mutated form of therianthrope that keeps the therians in wolf form and only transforms into human three nights a month during the full moon.

Althalar Coven

The Sussuri coven in Everlight run by Lelia Valdez.

The Ascendant Vanguard

The Ascendant Vanguard is a rumored coalition of supernatural creatures that are awaiting the return of the Ascendant.

C

The Church of the Damned

The Church of the Damned is a cult of humans who worship vampires. Their ultimate goal is to become vampire.

Circuls Elysii

The Circle of Elysium, a coven of Sussuri

The Creed of Celestial Beings

The CCB is typically a therian organization that beleives all therians should be one without leadership of an Alpha.

D

Discuri Oneiroi

A Sussuri coven that split from Circuls Elysii when they fled to the New World.

E

Everlilght City Council

The mundane human government.

H

The Heritage Council

The Venatori are governed by the Heritage Council, they beleive it is their universal right police the supernatural world. The man in charge of what remains of the Venatori in Everlight is John Bowers.

N

The New World Order

A supernatural organization that believes that the supernatural should rule the world. Their organization is secretive and no one really knows much about them other than that they do exist and are making plans. What those plans are no one knows, but their goal is to free the supernatural from the Clandestine Providence

The Nightstalker Pack

A therian pack located in Danghburg. The current alpha is Gregory Lin.

S

The Sanguine Masquerade

A vampire crime syndicate that beleives in upholding the Clandestine Providence to keep humans in the dark about the occult. They are run by Salvatore Einor. The Sanguine Masquerade is Anti-Venatori.

V

The Vampyre Convenant

All vampires can trace their ancestry back to one of 5 Vampire Families. The closer you are to the top of the ancestry line the more powerful a name you have. The First vampires were born vampires. There are only a handful of families left after Diego Giovanni embraced the first human and vampirism spread to the human populace and born and embraced vampires a like were hunted and killed during the dark ages -- almost to extinction.

Guilds

Eldritch Scholars

  • Philosophy: The Eldritch Scholars are dedicated to unraveling the mysteries of the supernatural world, both for the advancement of knowledge and to prevent catastrophic events. They believe that understanding the occult can help avert disasters and protect both humans and supernatural beings.
  • Activities: Researching ancient texts and artifacts, investigating supernatural phenomena, and sharing their findings with responsible factions.

"When the moon of silver veils the sun, and the arcane ley lines converge in a symphony of power, the Ascendant shall awaken from their slumber. Born of both worlds, their spirit entwined with magic's core, they will bridge the realms, uniting what was sundered. The realms will resonate, trembling with their presence, as ancient forces stir in acknowledgment. Guided by the echoes of forgotten whispers, the Ascendant shall stand at the crossroads of destiny, a beacon of change and hope. Their choices will shape the tapestry of reality, and as they ascend, they will illuminate a path toward equilibrium or cataclysm."

Veil Wardens

  • Philosophy: The Veil Wardens are dedicated to ensuring that the supernatural world remains hidden from the majority of humans, but without resorting to extreme measures like murder. They work to subtly manipulate events and information to keep the occult hidden while avoiding direct confrontation.
  • Activities: Crafting illusions, influencing media and public perception, and managing events that could reveal the supernatural world.
  • The most power

"When the silver shroud of secrecy begins to fray, and the line between the unseen and the known blurs, the Ascendant shall step from the shadows. Born of mystery, their essence intertwined with the arcane currents, they will stand as a bridge, beckoning both realms to reveal their truths. As they emerge, whispers of forgotten tales shall resound, stirring the realms to acknowledge the convergence. Guided by their purpose, the Ascendant shall unravel the mysteries of the ages, unraveling the tapestry of deception or enlightenment."

Nex Machina

  • Philosophy: The Nex Machina faction consists of supernatural beings who believe in harnessing technology to enhance their powers and abilities. They seek to integrate the mystical and the technological, seeing it as the next step in evolution.
  • Activities: Developing magical technology, researching the fusion of magic and science, and exploring ways to augment supernatural abilities through innovative means.
  • The least power

"When the threads of magic intertwine with the circuits of innovation, the Ascendant shall emerge from the convergence. Born of ancient spells and modern codes, they shall wield the essence of both arcane and artificial worlds. As they rise, the boundaries of power shall blur, and the gears of change shall set in motion. Guided by their fusion, the Ascendant shall command the harmony of magic and technology, forging a new reality or dismantling the old."
